Layers.Name: Always
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on any page of this site.

Layers.Name: Homepage
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are only displayed on the homepage.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item where you can place other content items.

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides a Liquid formatted body for your content item.
Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Provides a custom url for your content item.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item for preview. You only need to use this for the content preview feature when running the frontend decoupled from the admin.
Provides a way to add widgets to Layout zones for your content item.
Provides a customizable body for your content item where you can build a content structure with widgets.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item where you can place other content items.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior with the Content Picker for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior with a field to display html for the link text.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: A description of the image used as title or alternate text
